description: The BLACK+DECKER HNV220BCZ01 Compact Lithium Hand Vacuum is lightweight, yet powerful, easy to charge and easy to clean. This cordless hand vacuum has it all. The HNV220BCZ01 is powered by a 2.0 Ah lithium ion battery that provides 12.3 minutes of runtime, holds a charge when its off its charger, offers more charge cycles and is lighter than NiCd batteries. This lightweight vacuum is only 1.43 pounds and has 16 Air Watts of suction power. The translucent bagless dirt bowl makes it easy see the dirt level in the 12.5 oz capacity bowl and is easy to empty and wash. The included wall-mountable charger allows for 1 step charging and storage. Kit includes: (1) Hand Vacuum, (1) Crevice Tool, (1) Brush Tool, (1) Washable Bag Filter (EVF100), and (1) wall mountable charger. Backed by a 2 Year Limited Warranty.

description:
Easily tackle unexpected messes with the Dirt Devil® Quick Flip® Hand Vacuum, BD30010FDI. Perfect for small apartments, dorms and cars, this 8v Lithium-Ion cordless hand vac is powerful, compact and can easily tackle any unexpected mess. The versatile Quick Flip® crevice tool is stored right on the unit—just flip out the tool and click it into place to easily reach debris in crevices and tough corners. It’s that simple. And, a special designed handle fits perfectly in the palm of your hand while an easy empty dirt cup makes it even more convenient to get the job done quicker.

• 8v Lithium Battery- for faster charging, longer runtime and fade-free power
• Quick Flip® Crevice Tool- stored right on the unit to reach debris in tough corners
• Lightweight Design – easily carry from one mess to the next.
• Easy-Empty Dirt Cup
• Limited 2-Year Warranty

description: The BLACK+DECKER HHVJ315JD10 Lithium Hand Vacuum with POWERBOOST is powered by a lithium ion battery that holds a charge when its off its charger, offers more charge cycles and is lighter than NiCd batteries. The cyclonic action rapidly spins debris away from the filter so the suction power stays strong longer. POWERBOOST mode gives you 2 speed control so you can give your vacuum a boost of suction of up to 18 Air Watts with the push of a button when you need it, while maximizing your runtime and providing you the ability to vacuum drapes and other delicate items when you don't. The fast charger re-charges your hand vacuum in only 4 hours. The translucent dust bowl allows you to see when the 16.9 oz bowl needs to be emptied. The washable bowl and filters provide for thorough cleaning. The vacuum has a convenient built-in extendable crevice tool for hard to reach areas and flip-up brush for dusting. This vacuum is white with grey and black accents. Backed by a 2 Year Limited Warranty.

description: Clean wherever your pet goes with the BISSELL® Pet Hair Eraser® Cordless Handheld Vacuum. This lightweight and cordless handheld device allows you to clean up pet hair and dirt that collects on your furniture, in your carpet, in your car or wherever your furry friends play. The detachable motorized brush helps capture more embedded pet hair and dirt, providing a deeper clean. The included crevice tool and upholstery tool can be used separately or stacked together to combine their usefulness. In addition, this pet hair vacuum has a two-stage filtration system designed to help extend the life of the filter and provide easier cleaning.

description: The BLACK+DECKER HFVB320J27 Lithium Flex Hand Vacuum with Pet Attachment is a must have for help in a variety of cleaning applications including picking up pet hair. This hand vacuum is cordless, portable, and ultra-compact. The 4 foot flexible hose for extended reach allows you to reach dirt high and low and in tight spaces. A high performance motor with cyclonic action along with the 3-Stage filtration helps to keep the filter clear and ensure its suction power stays strong. The lithium ion battery is lightweight, provides strong suction, and holds a charge even when the vacuum is not on the charger. The hand vac is only 2.8 pounds. The large 16.9 ounce translucent bagless dirt canister allows you to see when the vacuum needs to be emptied and is easy to use. The filter is removable and washable for long life. The pet attachment effectively removes pet hair better than a motorized brush and without tangles. Kit includes: hand vacuum, Pet Hair Tool, Flip-up Brush, Crevice Tool, Washable Filter (PVF110), and charger. Backed by a 2 Year Limited Warranty.

Powered by Dyson digital motor V7, the most powerful handheld vacuum. Up to 30 minutes of fade-free suction. With fade-free lithium-ion batteries, suction starts strong and stays strong. Hygienically drive out trapped dust and debris in single action, there’s no need to touch the dirt. Mini motorized tool removes pet hair and ground-in dirt. The powerful motorized brush bar has stiff nylon bristles. Quieter and more powerful than the Dyson V6 Trigger. Acoustically engineered to reduce volume and improve sound quality. Dyson's free 2 year warranty covers parts and labor, plus free shipping there and back.

description: Save time and energy cleaning up after pets with BISSELL® Bolt Lithium Max Pet Cordless Hand Vacuum. It’s easy to clean up pet messes with the specialized pet tools and up to 25 minutes of cordless suction (indicated by an easy-to-read battery power light). The extra-large dirt bin allows you to empty less in between cleans. Plus, the Clean Turn Filtration helps release excess dirt and debris when emptying. Specially designed tools help with pet-made messes: the Crevice Tool makes it easy to clean narrow spaces and upholstery while the Pet Hair Nozzle helps pull and lift up embedded hair and dirt from soft surfaces. Take the time and effort out of cleaning your home with the BISSELL® Bolt Lithium Max Pet Cordless Hand Vacuum.

description: Get quick cleanups done with the BLACK+DECKER BDH2000L Lithium Rechargeable Hand Vacuum that goes anywhere you need it. A powerful 20V MAX* lithium battery provides long runtime. The lithium ion technology makes this vac compact, lightweight, and always ready for use while in addition to long battery life as it holds a charge when unplugged for up to 18 months. The long reach rotating slim nozzle is ideal for cleanup of dust, pet hair, and crumbs from tight spaces. Cyclonic action helps to keep the filter clean and power strong. A ready indicator light signals when the hand vac is fully charged and ready for ruse. The translucent dirt bowl makes it easy to see dirt and is easy to empty. The removable, washable bowl and filter can simply be rinsed under running water. The extendable crevice tool makes it so you don't have to bend over as much. *Maximum initial battery voltage (measured without a workload) is 20 volts. Nominal voltage is 18. Package Includes: (1) BDH2000L hand vac, (1) Washable Filter (model # VF110), (1) Charging Base, (1) On-Board Crevice Tool, (1) On-Board Brush Tool. 2 Year Limited Warranty.

description: This Armor All 12V Wet/Dry Handheld Vacuum is a powerful and easy-to-use tool specifically designed to clean the interior of your car. Its ability to pick up both wet and dry debris makes it a popular choice for auto cleaning. This hand vac is powered by a 15-foot cord that conveniently plugs into the 12V outlet (cigarette lighter) of your vehicle for cleaning power wherever you go. It also includes a removable, washable filter for efficient pickup and long-term use. Other features are the built-in crevice tool which slides out from the head, an LED light that is handy for seeing into dark corners and cracks, a brush, a squeegee tool and a storage bag for organized portability.

The 20V MAX* Lithium Flex Vac with Floor Head offers limitless versatility. Choose between the 4- foot extendable hose or the Pet Brush attachment. The compact design and lightweight yet powerful 20V MAX* lithium ion battery and high performance motor delivers 24 Air Watts of suction power and 16 minutes of run time while making it easy to take the Flex straight to the mess. The 12.5 oz translucent bowl allows you to see when you need to empy the debris so you maintain your power and a quick release button makes it quick and easy to empty the dust bowl or change filters. description: The BLACK+DECKER HHVJ320BMF26 SMARTECH Cordless 2.0Ah Lithium Hand Vacuum features BATTERYSENSE, FILTERSENSE, and POWERBOOST technology.  BATTERYSENSE indicates your battery state of charge so you're never caught off-guard.  FILTERSENSE alerts you when your washable filter needs to be cleaned or replaced. Dual power levels ensure strong suction when you need it.  Choose low speed and suction with 12 Air Watts for sensitive applications such as vacuuming curtains + linens, or choose POWERBOOST for extra suction of 21 Air Watts with a push of a button.  The 2.0 Ah lithium ion battery gives you up to 15 minutes of runtime, is longer lasting and lighter than NiCad.  The light weight portable design featuring a comfortable well balanced handle makes it easy to use and convenient for cleaning.  The built in flip-up brush is ideal for dusting and cleaning upholstery and the extendable crevice tool helps you clean hard-to-reach areas.  The cyclonic action helps keep the filter clean and suction strong, with a washable filter that allows you to clean it when indicated and a tool-free detachable beater bar makes cleaning quick and simple.   The HHVJ320BMF26 comes in an attractive chili red coloring.  The large 16.9 oz translucent bagless bowl allows you to do a lot of cleaning before emptying the bowl and makes it easy to see when you should empty the debris.  The bowl is easy to remove with the push of a button.  Kit includes: (1) HHVJ320BMF26 hand vacuum, (1) Wall Mountable Charging Base, (1) Flip-Up Brush, (1)Extendable Crevice Tool, (1) VBF10 Washable Bag Filter, and (1) VSPF10LC Washable Plastic Pre-Filter. description: The BLACK+DECKER BDH1220AV 12V DC Automotive Hand Vacuum is versatile and easy to use for effective car cleaning. The 12 volt DC adapter fits into cigarette lighter for user convenience, with a 16 foot cable that allows you to reach all areas of your car.  The cable wraps around the base for tidy storage.  The vac has 12.5 Air Watts of power and cyclonic action spins dirt away from the filter and means suction power stays stronger for longer.  Its one step emptying process allows you to not have to touch the mess and the 20.6 oz capacity translucent bowl allows you to pick up a lot of debris see when you need to empy the debris so you maintain your power.  The built in extra long slim nozzle with wide mouth gives you 50% extra reach and the wide mouth allows you to pick up large debris.  The included flexible hose and brush clean awkward areas and tight spots with ease while the extra long crevice tool gives you access for cleaning between car seats for a deep down clean.  The BDH1220AV includes a Full Accessory Kit And Storage Bag that helps keeping the work/storage area clean and all the accessories together.   Backed by a 2 Year Limited Warranty.  Kit Includes: (1) BDH1220AV Auto Vac with extra long nozzle, (1) VF110 Filter, (1) Flexible Hose, (1) Long Crevice Tool, (1) Brush Tool, (1) Storage Bag.
title: BLACK+DECKER™ 12V Automotive Hand Vacuum - Gray with Chili Red BDH1220AV

The specially designed Pet Hair Nozzle powers through pet hair, and the included crevice tool with dusting brush helps clean hard-to-reach areas. It’s powerful pet hair pickup with a handheld design.

description: The BLACK+DECKER BDH1200FVAV 12 Volt DC Flexi Auto Vac features a unique integrated hose which allows you to reach all areas of your car where other hand vacs cannot.  The patented 'motor in the filter' technology allows the hand Vac to be ultra compact.  It offers a long crevice tool for tight areas such as underneath and in between car seats.  The combined crevice and soft brush is all in one tool for ease of use.  This vac has dual functionality - it can be used as a traditional hand Vac or the handle can be removed for hard to reach areas.  Cyclonic action spins dirt away from the filter maintaining optimum suction power, and a filter cleaning wheel for easy and hands free cleaning of the filter.  It also features a transparent dust bowl which allows you to know when to empty the hand vac, and the side empty door is an easy to empty system which means all the dirt goes straight in the bin and your hands don't touch the dirt.  The 12V DC adapter fits into a cigarette lighter socket and the 16 foot cord allows you to reach all areas of your car including the boot cable. The cord can be easily wrapped around the car vac before storing it away. Kit Includes: (1) BDH1200PVAV Flexi Auto Vac, (1) PVF110 Filter; (1) Integrated 4 foot Flexible Hose, (1) 2-in-1 Flip-Up Brush/Wide Nozzle Tool, (1) Long Crevice Tool.  Backed by a 2 Year Limited Warranty.
title: BLACK+DECKER™ 12V Automotive Flex Vacuum - Gray with Chili Red BDH1200FVAV

The ergonomic soft-grip handle design gives comfort with total control to clean anywhere in your home or as a cordless car vacuum. Multiple tools and attachments are stored on the cordless handheld car vacuum, ready for use right when you need it. The high-powered motorized brush roll means cleaning pet hair or deep down dirt from carpet and upholstery is easy. Removable dirt bin offers flexibility in how you clean and where you empty. The removable battery allows you to charge your battery while storing your vacuum where ever you want.

description:
The Hoover® Air™ Cordless Hand Vac powers through everyday messes with fade-free cordless convenience. Pick up around furniture and stairs with the Powered Turbo Tool, then use the crevice tool to get into tight spots with ease. For advanced versatility, simply fit the lightweight hand vac into an Air™ Cordless 2-in-1 to cover carpets and hard floors. And you can even use the interchangeable 20V LithiumLife™ Battery with any product powered by LithiumLife™ Battery Technology.

Features:

  • Interchangeable 20V LithiumLife™ Battery System lets you use any LithiumLife™ battery you already have with our line of products. A battery fuel gauge lets you see when it's time to recharge.
  • Fade-Free Battery Technology delivers fade-free power for the entire life of the battery.*
  • Lightweight design weighs less than 4 lbs. so you can go from room-to-room with ease.
  • Powered Turbo Tool powerfully picks up hair on furniture and stairs.
  • Crevice Tool cleans cracks and crevices with precision.
  • Reusable Easy Rinse Filter can be cleaned under running water for long-lasting use.
  • 2-Year Limited Warranty

Includes:

  • (1) Cordless Hand Vac
  • (1) LithiumLife™ Battery
  • (1) Battery Charger
  • (2) Reusable Easy Rinse Filters
  • (1) Powered Turbo Tool
  • (1) Crevice Tool

*The LithiumLife™ battery provides full air power while the battery discharges.
title: Hoover Air Cordless Handheld Vacuum, BH52160

Recommended Surface Application: Hard Floor, Multi-surface, Hardwood, Carpet

description: Wagan EL7201 Auto-Vac features a powerful 100 watt motor that can handle life’s messes. Perfect for families, teens, travelers, truckers, or anyone who needs a quick and convenient way to clean the interior of their vehicle, camper, tent*, or RV! The Wagan tech Auto-Vac is perfect for cleaning messy areas. Plug the Auto-Vac into your vehicle’s 12V DC Socket, turn the power switch to the “On” position, and begin to vacuum up the mess. To clean out the Auto-Vac , simply remove the front cover, pull out the filter screen, and dump the contents into the trash. Re-assemble in reverse order and the Auto-Vac is ready for the next mess! You will be amazed at how simple the Auto-Vac really is, but will impress you most when you use the Auto-Vac. With 100 watts of power (Best in class power), you will find yourself looking for messes to clean. With the included crevice nozzle and brush, you can get into tight areas that normal vacuums just cannot reach. In between seat cushions, in door jams, corners, under seats, air vents, under carpeting, it all can be done with the Auto-Vac! The Auto-Vac is unlike anything else in the market. It is designed to be compact so that it easily stores in small spaces, sleek so that it may reach narrow spots, and stylish so that it sets itself apart from the other boring vacuums out there. With an 11 foot power cord, the Auto-Vac is able to reach those faraway places that the competition fall short of. With the addition of a Power Supply like Wagan Tech’s Power Dome EX, you can use the Auto-Vac in remote places that are away from your vehicle’s DC Socket! In a tent, trailer, or any place that a Power Supply can go, you can clean it with the Auto-Vac!
title: Wagan Tech 12-Volt Auto Vacuum - Gray/Yellow

bullets: Most Powerful Unit in the Market

description: The BLACK+DECKER BDH2020FLFH 20V MAX* Lithium Flex Vac does it all from floor to ceiling and everything in between.  The 20V MAX* Lithium Flex Vac with Floor Head offers limitless versatility. Choose between the 4- foot extendable hose, the stick vac attachment with pivoting floor head, or the Pet Brush attachment.  Having an optional stick vac attachment makes this the ultimate in portable and multi-functional vacuuming.  No longer just a simple hand-carried vacuum, the Flex Vac provides easy clean-up; high or low, in the house or car, and on any floor surface – wood, tile, carpet, rugs.  It has a flexible 4-foot hose to reaches dirt high and low and this cordless, portable and ultra-compact vac allows you to tackle your chores without lugging out your full size vacuum.  The compact design and lightweight yet powerful 20V MAX* lithium ion battery and high performance motor delivers 24 Air Watts of suction power and 16 minutes of run time while making it easy to take the Flex straight to the mess.  This Flex Vac has an easy to empty removable 17 ounce capacity washable bowl and filter for thorough cleaning.  Cyclonic action spins dirt away from the filter to help maintain performance and a 3 stage filtration system prevents dust and debris from escaping.  The included Pet Brush makes cleaning pet hair a breeze.  Kit includes: Flex Vac, Charging base with Tool Storage, Flip-Up Dusting Brush, Crevice Tool, Stick Vac Attachment with Pivoting Floor Head, Pet Brush, and Washable Filter (PVF110).  Backed by a 2 Year Limited Warranty.
title: BLACK+DECKER™ 20V MAX* Lithium FLEX™ Hand Vacuum with Floor Head Stick Vac Attachment- Black BDH2020FLFH

description: The BLACK+DECKER HHVJ315JMF71 SMARTECH 1.5Ah Cordless Lithium Hand Vacuum features BATTERYSENSE, FILTERSENSE, and POWERBOOST technology.  BATTERYSENSE indicates your battery state of charge so you're never caught off-guard.  FILTERSENSE alerts you when your washable filter needs to be cleaned or replaced. Dual power levels ensure strong suction when you need it.  Choose low speed and suction with 11 Air Watts for sensitive applications such as vacuuming curtains + linens, or choose POWERBOOST for extra suction of 19 Air Watts with a push of a button.  The 1.5 Ah lithium ion battery gives you up to 15 minutes of runtime, is longer lasting and lighter than NiCad.  The light weight portable design featuring a comfortable well balanced handle makes it easy to use and convenient for cleaning. The built in flip-up brush is ideal for dusting and cleaning upholstery and the extendable crevice tool helps you clean hard-to-reach areas.  The cyclonic action helps keep the filter clean and suction strong, with a washable filter that allows you to clean it when indicated and a tool-free detachable beater bar makes cleaning quick and simple.  The HHVJ315JMF71 comes in an attractive titanium with eggplant accent coloring.  The large 16.9 oz translucent bagless bowl allows you to do a lot of cleaning before emptying the bowl and makes it easy to see when you should empty the debris.  The bowl is easy to remove with the push of a button.  Kit includes: (1) HHVJ315JMF71 hand vacuum, (1) Jack Plug Charger, (1) Flip-Up Brush, (1)Extendable Crevice Tool, (1) VBF10 Washable Bag Filter, and (1) VSPF10LC Washable Plastic Pre-Filter.   Backed by a 2 Year Limited Warranty.
title: BLACK+DECKER™ SMARTECH™ Hand Vacuum - Titanium & Eggplant HHVJ315JMF71
bullet_description: Includes: Instruction manual, rechargeable battery, charger, reusable filter

description: The BLACK+DECKER HHVJ320BMFS27 SMARTECH 2.0AH Cordless Lithium Hand Vacuum with Scent features BatterySense which senses and displays the battery status as you clean so you're never caught off-guard, along with FilterSense which alerts you when your washable filter needs to be changed.  A scented filter provides a clean, fresh aroma while vacuuming which allows you to freshen while you clean.  The HHVJ320BMFS27 has 2 speed settings so you can choose low speed for sensitive applications such as vacuuming curtains + linens, or choose POWERBOOST for extra suction with the push of a button.  The hand vac is well balanced and a comfortable handle along with a lightweight lithium battery + portable design make it easy to use and convenient for cleaning.  The translucent, washable dirt bowl + filters are easy to clean between jobs.  A pull-out crevice tool helps you clean hard-to-reach areas and the flip-up brush is ideal for dusting and cleaning upholstery.  Cyclonic action helps keep the filter clean and suction strong. description: The BLACK+DECKER BDH1200PVAV 12 Volt DC Pivot Auto Vac has the features you need to keep your car's interior clean year round. It is versatile and easy to use for effective car cleaning. The 12 volt DC adapter fits into cigarette lighter for user convenience, with a 16 foot cable that allows you to reach all areas of your car. The innovative pivoting nose has 10 settings for maximum flexibility to clean in hard to reach areas such as underneath and in between car seats and the built-in extendable crevice tool allows you to clean even in small areas. This pivot vac also offers a convenient crevice tool and brush which are stored on board and make them ideal for cleaning difficult-to-reach areas and brushing seats and floors. At 12.5 Air Watts, this vacuum has plenty of power for quick pick-ups, and features a double action filtration system which is designed to perform better and last longer. The 14.9 oz translucent bowl allows you to pick up a lot of debris before emptying and see when it is full. The bowl is quick and easy to open and to change filters. The BDH1200PVAV uses replacement filter PVF110. Kit Includes: (1) BDH1200PVAV Pivot Auto Vac, (1) on-board flip-up brush, (1) on-board extendable crevice tool, (1) Flexible Hose, (1) Large Soft Brush, and (1) Storage Bag. Backed by a 2 Year Limited Warranty.

The Lithium Technology gives you 20 Air Watts of strong suction and fade free power.  The 4' flexible hose easily reaches tight spots, high shelves, and more.  The stick vac floor head converts the Flex vac to a stick vac for larger cleaning jobs while remaining cordless, portable, and ultra-compact so you can tackle chores without lugging out yoru full-size vacuum.
